definition[0]: belonging to or connected with people or things that have already been mentioned
example[0]: They washed their faces and went to bed.
example[1]: The twins spend all their time together.
example[2]: People had moved back into their own homes.
definition[1]: used when talking about someone who may be male or female, to avoid saying ‘his or her’
example[3]: Everyone is free to express their own opinion.
example[4]: Each student will have their own course-work folder.
